articles.author: Rachel Treisman
articles.title: The government shutdown is now the longest in U.S. history. See how it compares - NPR
articles.description: As the government shutdown stretches its way into the record books, Americans are feeling its worsening impacts.
articles.content:
The ongoing government shutdown entered its 36th full day on Wednesday, which officially makes it the longest in U.S. history.
It takes the title from the most recent shutdown, which stretched from … [+3240 chars]
